Description: In October, a video surfaced showing the execution of 16 Ukrainian prisoners of war by Russian soldiers in the Pokrovske direction, triggering a criminal investigation by Ukraine's Security Service (SBU).

Title: Ukrainian prosecutors say Russians executed 93 Ukrainian POWs
Description: Officials report that 80% of executions of Ukrainian POWs by Russian troops occurred in 2024, marking an alarming escalation in violations of war laws.

Title: Ukrainian drone strikes Russian S-400 radar in Belgorod Oblast (v...
Description: Ukrainian drone attack disabled Russia's 96L6 radar, part of the S-400 surface-to-air missile system.

Title: Sweden pledges € 2.4 million to boost Ukraine’s war crime investi...
Description: The fund will support the SMEREKA e-case management system in Ukraine, upgrading digital infrastructure for law enforcement and prosecutors.

Title: Swiss ambassador denies Switzerland’s support for China-Brazil 'p...
Description: He clarified that Switzerland attended the recent China-Brazil peace meeting only as an observer.

Title: European institutions halt contacts with Georgia’s government
Description: The EU has halted high-level contacts with 'Georgian Dream' government over its anti-Western stance. EU envoy Herczyński stressed democratic values and urged high voter turnout in the October elections.

Title: Ukraine to receive $23.6 million in Norwegian investments through...
Description: The initiative aims to reduce risks for investing companies, support reconstruction efforts

Title: Russia’s security chief at occupied Zaporizhzhia nuclear plant di...
Description: Ukrainian intelligence shared video of a car explosion in Russian-occupied Enerhodar, reportedly killing collaborator Andrii Korotkyi, head of 'physical security' at Zaporizhzhia NPP.

Title: Japan’s new PM Ishiba warns 'today’s Ukraine could be tomorrow’s ...
Description: Shigeru Ishiba discussed deteriorating relations with China, regional security concerns, defense strategies, and Japan's demographic crisis.

Description: Ukraine urges The Hague tribunal to order Russia to dismantle Kerch bridge, restore free navigation in Kerch Strait, and conduct environmental impact assessments.

Title: Bloomberg: EU prepares sanctions against Iran over ballistic miss...
Description: A package of EU sanctions targeting Iran's support for Russia's military efforts in Ukraine is in development, focusing on engineering, metals, and aviation companies.

Title: Pentagon: Intercepting missiles in Ukraine differs from Israel sc...
Description: The Pentagon clarified that NATO will not intercept missiles over Ukraine as it does in Israel, citing distinct battlefield conditions and the risk of direct war involvement.

Title: ISW: Russian offensive in Ukraine to culminate in coming months '...
Description: Russian offensive in eastern Ukraine produces gradual tactical gains but faces difficulties in achieving operationally significant objectives, ISW says.

Title: Two Russian oil depots catch fire, Ukraine says it hit one
Description: A drone attack set an oil depot ablaze in Russia's Voronezh Oblast. Concurrently, a fire erupted at an oil storage facility in Perm Krai, about 1,500 km from Ukraine. Russia’s Defense Ministry claimed shooting down 18 Ukrainian drones overnight.

Title: French-German defense manufacturer to supply 12 self-propelled ar...
Description: KNDS, a major European arms manufacturer, is set to deliver a dozen advanced artillery systems to Ukraine following a contract signing in Kyiv.
